author: rooneg
msg: On the ra-replay-dev branch: Add a new RA layer API for replaying the
exact changes that produced a given revision into an editor.  This is
intended to be used for mirroring a revision into a foreign repository.
This also adds a new svnsync command that uses this API to replicate
repositories.
* build.conf
(svnsync): New section for our new utility.
* subversion/include/svn_ra.h
(svn_ra_replay): New prototype.
* subversion/include/svn_repos.h
(svn_repos_replay2): New version of svn_repos_replay, lets you specify
if you want to recieve deltas for text and property changes and adds
the ability to limit the replay to a certain section of the repository.
(svn_repos_replay): Deprecate.
* subversion/libsvn_ra/ra_loader.h
(svn_ra__vtable_t): Add new replay method.
* subversion/libsvn_ra/ra_loader.c
(svn_ra_replay): New function.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_local/ra_plugin.c
(svn_ra_local__replay): Implementation of the replay interface for
libsvn_ra_local.
(ra_local_vtable): Add replay.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/replay.c
Include svn_props.h.
(path_driver_cb_baton): Add compare_root member, which holds the root
for the previous revision if we're generating deltas.  Add authz func
and baton.  Comment on the difference between the two root members.
Add members to store the base path, base path length, and the low
water mark for the client's historical data.
(add_subdir): New helper function for replaying the creation of a tree
into the editor, allows us to deal with the fact that the user might
not have the history needed to reproduce it themselves.
(is_within_base_path): Helper function to determine if a given path is
within the base path we're copying history under.
(path_driver_cb_func): Move copyfrom_path and copyfrom_rev up to the
top level of the function so they can be used as an indication that
an add is in fact a copy.  Send propchanges and text deltas if the
user requested them.  Handle authorization as it applies to copyfrom
sources.  Update comments.  Deal with the fact that the client may
not have enough history to make use of some copies or text deltas.
(svn_repos_replay2): New version of svn_repos_replay, sets up the
compare_root, base path, low water mark and authz members of the
baton, handles authz as it applies to modified paths we're not
allowed to see.
(svn_repos_replay): New wrapper function.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/client.c
(ra_svn_replay): Implementation of replay for ra_svn.
(ra_svn_vtable): Add replay.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/ra_dav.h
(svn_ra_dav__replay): New prototype.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c
(dav_vtable): Add replay method.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c
(svn_ra_dav__replay): Dummy implementation until I get around to
implementing this.
* subversion/svnserve/serve.c
(replay): Server side of the ra_svn replay code.
(main_commands): Add replay command.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/protocol: Document replay command.
* subversion/svnsync/main.c: New file, contains a program for replicating
a repository via the svn_ra_replay API.

author: rooneg
msg: Create a new branch for the development of the svn_ra_replay API.

author: pburba
msg: merge r17100:17413 from svn/branches/1.3.x to svn/branches/ebcdic/1.3.x

author: pburba
msg: Fix co bug where paths for mv log entries were absolute rather than relative.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c
(svn_wc__merge_props): Use utf-8 escaped SVN_UTF8_FSLASH symbolic constant
in place of string literal.

author: lundblad
msg: On wc-propcaching branch: Kill another TODO from the code.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c
(svn_wc_props_modified_p): If the path has no entry, there is no prop mods.
